title: Which is the best smartphone for under 20k? - Quora

response.answer_text: Always try to buy a newly launched smartphone, so that helps to update always so I suggest yo to buy Moto G5 Plus or Moto G Plus 5th Generation smartphone and good news for you this phone in your budget. Check the details of specification below: Moto G5 Plus (Fine Gold, 32 GB) (4 GB RAM) 4 GB RAM | 32 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 128 GB5.2 inch Full HD Display12MP Primary Camera | 5MP Front3000 mAh BatterySnapdragon 625 ProcessorAndroid Nougat 7Adreno 506 at 650 MHzMono Front PortingColor Balancing Dual LED FlashP2i Nano-coatingMoto ExperiencesFingerprint Reader, Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Ambient Light, ProximityPrice Rs. 16,999Find more reliable specs of Moto G5 Plus

If you slightly go above 1+1 is a great deal, Xiaomi Mi4 is also a beast, camera is better than 1+1. Only con with Mi4 is limited 16GB storage. 1+1 has 64 GB memory. Otherwise if you can wait, then Asus Zenfone 2 is coming. Zenfone 2 will be a incredible deal hopefully around 12k..
